languages.text: Став единоличным владетел{mf|ем|ьницей} десятины, вывезенной с Летуса, Вольный Торговец хоть и смог{mf||ла} воплотить в жизнь свои самые грандиозные замыслы, но колоссальное богатство стало проклятием фон Валанциус: мошенники и интриганы всех мастей стекались на Даргонус, рассчитывая хитростью заполучить частичку баснословного состояния, пираты снаряжали флотилии, желая разорить династическую сокровищницу, а бывшие верные соратники и подданные так и норовили обократь казну. Коррупция и козни изъели присвоенную десятину не хуже ржавых ветров Летуса.

As the sole owner of the Leethus tithe, the Rogue Trader was able to turn {mf|his|her} greatest ambitions into reality; however, the colossal wealth soon became a curse for the von Valancius dynasty. Frauds and tricksters of all kinds swarmed Dargonus, seeking to use their cunning to obtain even a small fraction of its fabulous wealth; pirates assembled flotillas, hoping to sack the dynasty's treasury; and even formerly loyal comrades and subjects soon leapt on every opportunity for embezzlement. Much like the rusty winds of Leethus had done before them, corruption and scheming soon began gnawing away at the appropriated tithe.
languages.original_text: Став единоличным владетел{mf|ем|ьницей} десятины, вывезенной с Летуса, Вольный Торговец хоть и смог{mf||ла} воплотить в жизнь свои самые грандиозные замыслы, но колоссальное богатство стало проклятием фон Валанциус: мошенники и интриганы всех мастей стекались на Даргонус, рассчитывая хитростью заполучить частичку баснословного состояния, пираты снаряжали флотилии, желая разорить династическую сокровищницу, а бывшие верные соратники и подданные так и норовили обократь казну. Коррупция и козни изъели присвоенную десятину не хуже ржавых ветров Летуса.

traits.locale_text: As the sole owner of the Leethus tithe, the Rogue Trader was able to turn {mf|his|her} most ambitious designs into reality; however, the colossal wealth became a curse on the von Valancius. Frauds and schemers of all kinds swarmed Dargonus, seeking to use their cunning to obtain a small fraction of the fabulous wealth; pirates assembled flotillas, hoping to sack the dynasty's treasury; and former loyal comrades and subjects let no opportunity for embezzlement slip away. Corruption and scheming were gnawing away at the appropriated tithe just like the rusty winds of Leethus once had.

As the sole owner of the Leethus tithe, the Rogue Trader was able to turn {mf|his|her} most ambitious designs into reality; however, the colossal wealth became a curse on the von Valancius. Frauds and schemers of all kinds swarmed Dargonus, seeking to use their cunning to obtain a small fraction of the fabulous wealth; pirates assembled flotillas, hoping to sack the dynasty's treasury; and former loyal comrades and subjects let no opportunity for embezzlement slip away. Corruption and scheming were gnawing away at the appropriated tithe just like the rusty winds of Leethus once had.

Much like the rusty winds of Leethus had done before them, corruption and scheming soon began gnawing away at the appropriated tithe.

Frauds and tricksters of all kinds swarmed Dargonus, seeking to use their cunning to obtain even a small fraction of its fabulous wealth; pirates assembled flotillas, hoping to sack the dynasty's treasury; and even formerly loyal comrades and subjects soon leapt on every opportunity for embezzlement. Much like the rusty winds of Leethus had done before them, corruption and scheming soon began gnawing away at the appropriated tithe.

languages.text: Als {mf|einziger Besitzer|einzige Besitzerin} des Leethus-Zehnts konnte {mf|der Freihändler seine|die Freihändlerin ihre} größten Vorhaben in die Tat umsetzen – doch der immense Reichtum erwies sich schon bald als Fluch für die Dynastie Valancius. Betrüger und Gauner aller Art kamen nach Dargonus, um durch Kniffe und Tricks zumindest einen kleinen Teil des legendären Wohlstands zu erhaschen. Piraten stellten Flotten zusammen und hofften, den Schatz der Dynastie einzusacken. Und selbst vormals loyale Kameraden und Untertanen stürzten sich auf jede Gelegenheit, etwas zu unterschlagen. Und wie die rostigen Winde auf Leethus vor ihnen, nagten kurz darauf Korruption und Machenschaften an dem angeeigneten Zehnt.
languages.original_text: As the sole owner of the Leethus tithe, the Rogue Trader was able to turn {mf|his|her} greatest ambitions into reality; however, the colossal wealth soon became a curse for the von Valancius dynasty. Frauds and tricksters of all kinds swarmed Dargonus, seeking to use their cunning to obtain even a small fraction of its fabulous wealth; pirates assembled flotillas, hoping to sack the dynasty's treasury; and even formerly loyal comrades and subjects soon leapt on every opportunity for embezzlement. Much like the rusty winds of Leethus had done before them, corruption and scheming soon began gnawing away at the appropriated tithe.

traits.locale_text: Als {mf|einziger Besitzer|einzige Besitzerin} des Leethus-Zehnts konnte {mf|der Freihändler seine|die Freihändlerin ihre} größten Vorhaben in die Tat umsetzen – doch der immense Reichtum erwies sich schon bald als Fluch für die Dynastie Valancius. Betrüger und Gauner aller Art kamen nach Dargonus, um durch Kniffe und Tricks zumindest einen kleinen Teil des legendären Wohlstands zu erhaschen. Piraten stellten Flotten zusammen und hofften, den Schatz der Dynastie einzusacken. Und selbst vormals loyale Kameraden und Untertanen stürzten sich auf jede Gelegenheit, etwas zu unterschlagen. Und wie die rostigen Winde auf Leethus vor ihnen, nagten kurz darauf Korruption und Machenschaften an dem angeeigneten Zehnt.

languages.text: Unique propriétaire de la dîme de Leethus, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} put réaliser ses plus grandes ambitions, mais très vite, sa fortune colossale devint une véritable malédiction pour la dynastie von Valancius. Fraudeurs et escrocs en tout genre déferlèrent sur Dargonus et ne reculèrent devant aucune bassesse pour obtenir ne serait-ce qu'une fraction de cette immense fortune. Des pirates assemblèrent des flottilles entières dans l'espoir de mettre à sac le trésor de la dynastie. Même des camarades et sujets autrefois loyaux sautèrent sur la moindre occasion de détourner de l'argent. Finalement, tout comme les vents corrosifs de Leethus, la corruption et les machinations rongèrent peu à peu la dîme.
languages.original_text: As the sole owner of the Leethus tithe, the Rogue Trader was able to turn {mf|his|her} greatest ambitions into reality; however, the colossal wealth soon became a curse for the von Valancius dynasty. Frauds and tricksters of all kinds swarmed Dargonus, seeking to use their cunning to obtain even a small fraction of its fabulous wealth; pirates assembled flotillas, hoping to sack the dynasty's treasury; and even formerly loyal comrades and subjects soon leapt on every opportunity for embezzlement. Much like the rusty winds of Leethus had done before them, corruption and scheming soon began gnawing away at the appropriated tithe.

Fraudeurs et escrocs en tout genre déferlèrent sur Dargonus et ne reculèrent devant aucune bassesse pour obtenir ne serait-ce qu'une fraction de cette immense fortune. Des pirates assemblèrent des flottilles entières dans l'espoir de mettre à sac le trésor de la dynastie. Même des camarades et sujets autrefois loyaux sautèrent sur la moindre occasion de détourner de l'argent. Finalement, tout comme les vents corrosifs de Leethus, la corruption et les machinations rongèrent peu à peu la dîme.

languages.text: 行商浪人将利瑟斯的全部什一税据为己有，拥有了实现一切野心的力量。然而，不计其数的财富也很快成为了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的祸根。各种各样的骗子与狡诈之徒蜂拥而至，试图利用诡计榨取财富，哪怕只有一小部分也好。众多海盗组建起了舰队，打算洗劫王朝国库。就连原本忠心耿耿的官员不愿放过这个捞油水的机会，他们采取一切手段贪墨国库。来自利瑟斯的腐化之风吹到了达戈努斯，抢来的什一税很快就沦为了阴谋与腐化的祭品。
languages.original_text: As the sole owner of the Leethus tithe, the Rogue Trader was able to turn {mf|his|her} greatest ambitions into reality; however, the colossal wealth soon became a curse for the von Valancius dynasty. Frauds and tricksters of all kinds swarmed Dargonus, seeking to use their cunning to obtain even a small fraction of its fabulous wealth; pirates assembled flotillas, hoping to sack the dynasty's treasury; and even formerly loyal comrades and subjects soon leapt on every opportunity for embezzlement. Much like the rusty winds of Leethus had done before them, corruption and scheming soon began gnawing away at the appropriated tithe.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人将利瑟斯的全部什一税据为己有，拥有了实现一切野心的力量。然而，不计其数的财富也很快成为了冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的祸根。各种各样的骗子与狡诈之徒蜂拥而至，试图利用诡计榨取财富，哪怕只有一小部分也好。众多海盗组建起了舰队，打算洗劫王朝国库。就连原本忠心耿耿的官员不愿放过这个捞油水的机会，他们采取一切手段贪墨国库。来自利瑟斯的腐化之风吹到了达戈努斯，抢来的什一税很快就沦为了阴谋与腐化的祭品。

languages.text: Como únic{mf|o|a} propietari{mf|o|a} del diezmo de Leethus, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente pudo hacer realidad sus mayores ambiciones, pero, no obstante, la colosal riqueza no tardó en transformarse en una maldición para la dinastía von Valancius. Dargonus se llenó de estafadores y mentirosos de todo tipo, en busca de la oportunidad de obtener aunque fuera una minúscula fracción de esa fabulosa riqueza; los piratas organizaron flotillas, con esperanza de poder saquear la tesorería de la dinastía, e incluso camaradas y súbditos que antes habían sido leales se abalanzaron sobre la mínima oportunidad de llenarse los bolsillos. Como ya habían hecho los vientos herrumbrosos de Leethus, la corrupción y las conspiraciones empezaron a consumir el diezmo arrebatado.
languages.original_text: As the sole owner of the Leethus tithe, the Rogue Trader was able to turn {mf|his|her} greatest ambitions into reality; however, the colossal wealth soon became a curse for the von Valancius dynasty. Frauds and tricksters of all kinds swarmed Dargonus, seeking to use their cunning to obtain even a small fraction of its fabulous wealth; pirates assembled flotillas, hoping to sack the dynasty's treasury; and even formerly loyal comrades and subjects soon leapt on every opportunity for embezzlement. Much like the rusty winds of Leethus had done before them, corruption and scheming soon began gnawing away at the appropriated tithe.

traits.locale_text: Como únic{mf|o|a} propietari{mf|o|a} del diezmo de Leethus, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente pudo hacer realidad sus mayores ambiciones, pero, no obstante, la colosal riqueza no tardó en transformarse en una maldición para la dinastía von Valancius. Dargonus se llenó de estafadores y mentirosos de todo tipo, en busca de la oportunidad de obtener aunque fuera una minúscula fracción de esa fabulosa riqueza; los piratas organizaron flotillas, con esperanza de poder saquear la tesorería de la dinastía, e incluso camaradas y súbditos que antes habían sido leales se abalanzaron sobre la mínima oportunidad de llenarse los bolsillos. Como ya habían hecho los vientos herrumbrosos de Leethus, la corrupción y las conspiraciones empezaron a consumir el diezmo arrebatado.

languages.text: リーザスの租税を唯一所有することで、ローグトレーダーは自らの最大の野望を現実のものとすることができた。しかし、その巨万の富はすぐにフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝にとって呪いとなった。ダルゴナスには、ほんの一握りでもその莫大な富を得ようと、詐欺師やペテン師が群がった。海賊たちは艦隊を編成し、王朝の財宝を略奪しようと目論んだ。そして、かつては忠実だった仲間や臣下たちまでもが、横領の機会を見つけては飛びつくようになった。かつてリーザスを蝕んだ赤錆の風のように、腐敗と陰謀が押収された租税を静かに、だが確実に蝕みはじめていた。
languages.original_text: As the sole owner of the Leethus tithe, the Rogue Trader was able to turn {mf|his|her} greatest ambitions into reality; however, the colossal wealth soon became a curse for the von Valancius dynasty. Frauds and tricksters of all kinds swarmed Dargonus, seeking to use their cunning to obtain even a small fraction of its fabulous wealth; pirates assembled flotillas, hoping to sack the dynasty's treasury; and even formerly loyal comrades and subjects soon leapt on every opportunity for embezzlement. Much like the rusty winds of Leethus had done before them, corruption and scheming soon began gnawing away at the appropriated tithe.

traits.locale_text: リーザスの租税を唯一所有することで、ローグトレーダーは自らの最大の野望を現実のものとすることができた。しかし、その巨万の富はすぐにフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝にとって呪いとなった。ダルゴナスには、ほんの一握りでもその莫大な富を得ようと、詐欺師やペテン師が群がった。海賊たちは艦隊を編成し、王朝の財宝を略奪しようと目論んだ。そして、かつては忠実だった仲間や臣下たちまでもが、横領の機会を見つけては飛びつくようになった。かつてリーザスを蝕んだ赤錆の風のように、腐敗と陰謀が押収された租税を静かに、だが確実に蝕みはじめていた。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Leethus aşarının tek sahibi olarak en büyük arzusunu gerçekleştirebildi. Ancak bu devasa servet, kısa sürede von Valancius hanesinin bir lanetine dönüştü. Envaiçeşit dolandırıcı ve üçkâğıtçı, Dargonus'a akın etti. Kurnazlık edip bu muhteşem servetin küçük bir kısmını az çok demeden ele geçirmeye çalıştılar. Korsanlar, hanedanlığın hazinesini yağmalamak umuduyla filotillalar kurdu. Hatta çok geçmeden eskiden sadık olan yoldaşlar ve tebaa bile aşarı zimmetlerine geçirebilmek için her türlü fırsatı değerlendirmeye çalıştı. Kısa sürede tıpkı Leethus'ın paslı rüzgârları gibi yolsuzluk ve üçkâğıtçılık, el koyulan aşarı kemirmeye başladı.
languages.original_text: As the sole owner of the Leethus tithe, the Rogue Trader was able to turn {mf|his|her} greatest ambitions into reality; however, the colossal wealth soon became a curse for the von Valancius dynasty. Frauds and tricksters of all kinds swarmed Dargonus, seeking to use their cunning to obtain even a small fraction of its fabulous wealth; pirates assembled flotillas, hoping to sack the dynasty's treasury; and even formerly loyal comrades and subjects soon leapt on every opportunity for embezzlement. Much like the rusty winds of Leethus had done before them, corruption and scheming soon began gnawing away at the appropriated tithe.

Envaiçeşit dolandırıcı ve üçkâğıtçı, Dargonus'a akın etti. Kurnazlık edip bu muhteşem servetin küçük bir kısmını az çok demeden ele geçirmeye çalıştılar. Korsanlar, hanedanlığın hazinesini yağmalamak umuduyla filotillalar kurdu. Hatta çok geçmeden eskiden sadık olan yoldaşlar ve tebaa bile aşarı zimmetlerine geçirebilmek için her türlü fırsatı değerlendirmeye çalıştı. Kısa sürede tıpkı Leethus'ın paslı rüzgârları gibi yolsuzluk ve üçkâğıtçılık, el koyulan aşarı kemirmeye başladı.
